price: 167. Diggah koroositeeh ku- Nubuwwannu yangaddeeh Sinam Yallih gitak waase mari, Nummah cakki gitak xer makkootiyyah makkoote.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَصَدُّواْ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ قَدۡ ضَلُّواْ ضَلَٰلَۢا بَعِيدًا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.
